short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed for AIG.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using WebBrowser Widget in Web Client, the external content may not show in the iframe because of the X-Frame-Options or Content Security Policy restrictions. This extension will pop up window on top of the iframe to display the external content if it can't be displayed directly in the iframe.
